entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • <input> tag helper inserting hidden element with name __Invariant #60723
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #60722
  • Precompiled views fetching not working on .NET 8 for MVC views #60726
  • Multi-threading exception System.InvalidOperationException in the BlazorWebAppMovies sample (re: Blazor + QuickGrid + EF Core) #60721
  • [10.0-preview.1] ASP.NET `RouteHandlerAnalyzer` - `System.IndexOutOfRangeException` #60719
  • [Blazor] Update AuthenticationStateProvider to take advantage of Declarative persistent component state #60718
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Proposal: Introduce a [DiLogger] attribute for automatic logger injection #60717
  • [Blazor] Support serialization extensibility for declarative persistent component state #60716
    .NET 10 Planning
  • SignInAsync doesn't call SignInOrTwoFactorAsync #60712
  • Kestrel inconsistent certificate chain handling between endpoint and default configuration #60709
  • System.NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding 1252 in .NET Core #60706
  • Blazor two-way bindings affecting incorrect binding object reference #60704

Closed

  • Perf regression: mvc #60707
  • Support registering OpenApiOperationTransformer via extension method for Minimal APIs #59180
    10.0-preview3
  • Quarantine <FAILING_TEST_NAME> #60708
  • Perf regression: json #60684
  • enhancednavigationstart Prevent Default does not work #60705

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some issues surrounding PublicTopLevelProgramGenerator.cs #60727
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Support forwarded headers in servers URL resolution #60725
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Flow the environment from Server to WebAssembly through SSR marker #60714
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25153.3 #60713
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Fix: Inconsistent certificate chain handling between endpoint and default configuration #60710
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • 1es-ify Localization pipeline #60720
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add support for ServerSentEventsResult and extension methods #60616
    area-minimal, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: use speakable implementation names #9195
  • Field-backed properties: fix links #9193
  • Add proposal for ignored directives #9192

Merged

  • Update lookup proposal with decisions from LDM #9194
  • Extensions: update proposal based on latest decision #9182
  • Add to agenda: Support optional arguments in Expression trees #9191

Updated

  • Field nullability revisions #9184
  • Collection expression arguments: open questions #9158

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 10.0 API Reviews #35722
  • EF9 Migration Performance Regression #35716
  • M.D.Sqlite: More robust cross-platform extension loading #35715

Closed

  • Cannot roundtrip TimeSpan.MinValue #35714

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Process Coalesce-simplified Convert node properly in funcletizer #35721
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35720
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0-staging] Transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35719
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35718
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0-staging] Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35717
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Add function mapping for Ticks to sqlserver #35465
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlnsDefinitonAttribute is not supported for "this" assembly #28150
  • [iOS] Label LinebreakMode (TailTruncation) for FormattedText does't work in CollectionView after scroll #28147
    Backlog
  • Issue with .Net Maui. ShellContent OnSelected property doesnt exist. #28142
  • Keyboard Scrolling Crash #28140
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28135
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Trackpad horizontal scroll permanently locks scrolling axis in MAUI WebView #28131
  • [9.0 SR4 Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28130
    .NET 9 SR5

Closed

  • Navigation turns off Android "Immersive mode" #28108
  • Maui Android app update from Play store is crashing on startup #28146
  • Border control performance issue #20734
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] invalid GradientBrush color causes crash #15667
    Backlog
  • ImageButton Padding resizes image down unexpectedly even when there is available space #22521
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [9.0] [Windows] [Regression] WebView control fails to display content, resulting in a blank screen. #27133
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Not showing ,net maui templates #28057
  • Image Resizing issue on MAUI android app #28129
  • Update SkiaSharp in maui to the latest 3.x stable to get the security fixes #26099
    .NET 9 SR5
  • ShellTitleView Command Binding not working #12352
  • Keyboard Does Not Close on Search Button Press in SearchBar Control #28110
  • IOS: PlatformView cannot be null here (Microsoft.Maui.IEditor) #27872
  • HybridWebView can not load .js.map file. #27943

PullRequests

Created

  • Start shipping WorkloadDependencies.json #28149
  • Fix Crashing issue with keyboard scrolling iOS #28148
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 SR5
  • [ci] Publish VS workload zips #28145
  • 2025-3-3-docs-UiTesting.md-improvements #28143
    community ✨
  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • [Bindings SG] Filter out false positive Binding.Create matches #28138
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 4 #28137
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Blank Screen on navigating back to Previous Page #28133
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Shell BackButtonBehavior binding Command to valid ICommand causes back button to disappear #28132
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix broken/unreliable UI tests #28125
    area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area-drawing, community ✨, stale, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Optimize formatted labels #28073
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Ignore for now obsoletes on iOS #28136
    platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10.0 #28044
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview2

Updated

  • SelectionLength property update when entry is focused - fix #26213
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5
  • CollectionView2 Items display issue when Header/Footer is resized on iOS #27076
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: TapGestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve PropertyMapper performance #28077
    p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, .NET 9 SR5
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Windows] Fix for FontImageSource color is not applied to the Tab Icon on the TabbedPage #26888
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Make sure the Window is available #28013
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR5
  • [iOS] Buttons with Gradient and ImageSource at the same time: ImageSource doesn't appear - fix #27572
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button, .NET 9 SR5
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102

    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR5

    area-tooling
  • Fix 24214 [Windows] IconImageSource as StreamImageSource of ContentPage in TabbedPage doesn't display #28127

  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965

  • [Windows] Fixed the text and icon color issues in the DatePicker when hovering over it. #27147

  • Fixed the CollectionView scroll the content inside Editor when tapping to get focus on it #27851

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose IBuiltInAnalyzer.GetAnalyzerCategory in some fashion. #77399
  • Remove unnecessary lambda expression (IDE0200) when lambda is necessary #77395
    Backlog
  • The commands "Next Method" and "Previous Method" don't clear selection and move caret if a selection is active #77393
  • Incorrect CS8911 for 'global using unsafe' with pointer type #77389

Closed

  • Exception trying to get the extent of a (malformed) string literal #77198
  • C# editor pressing CTRL+BACKSPACE to erase a word causes an error dialog to appear when the word is an unclosed " #77401
  • MemberNotNullWhen does not work with inheritance #77313
  • DoesNotReturnAttribute is not considered in catch block #77398
  • IDE0059 erroneously raised for write into span #77390

PullRequests

Created

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77400
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix out of bounds in text extent computation #77402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove async/await #77397
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify keyword recommenders. #77396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix unexpected exceptions #77385
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix formatting in tests #77394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't report NFW for expected exceptions on shutdown. #77370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: rewrite delegate and function pointer creations #77378
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Collection expression arguments: ref safety tests #77381
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #74353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Seeing what tests cover the concept of other-diagnostics #77063
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Http3 in scenarios where ipv6 has been disabled at the runtime level #113100
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters compatibility package question #113099
  • `statfs`/`statvfs` calls in native impl. for `[System.IO.DriveInfo]::GetDrives()` hangs when run against a disconnected network mountpoint #113098
  • InvariantGlobalization does not behave as documented #113097
  • Proposal: Enhance ToDictionary with Duplicate Key Handling Options #113096
  • [API Proposal]: Add AVX10.2 MoveScalar APIs: VMOVD / VMOVW #113090
  • Mac OSX - Timer runs early and causes Elapsed Handler to execute twice. #113089
  • Use PGO for Optimize Bools and If Conversion #113080
  • System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement GetAuthorizationGroups fails with "Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212)" #113079
  • error CS1056: Unexpected character '−' with Regex on Mac #113077
  • [Mono AOT] Skip compiling methods from the `METHODSPEC` table that are trimmed away #113076
    10.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Emit dedup generic types directly into source assemblies #113075
    10.0.0
  • [Mono AOT] Improve `dn_simdhash` lookup on arm64 #113074
    10.0.0
  • [Android][Apple] Setup build-time performance measurements for mobile platforms in the perf lab #113073
    10.0.0
  • Arm64: Use carry instructions for 128bit arithmetic #113070
  • [API Proposal]: Tensor Operations Per Dimension #113068
    10.0.0
  • create host to run on wasm/browser #113067
  • build coreclr parts required for the interpreter #113065
  • run paltests on helix #113064
  • paltests build on CI #113063
    10.0.0
  • [tvOS] XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest fails #113062
  • Undocumented ArgumentOutOfRangeException in XmlReader created from MemoryStream #113061
  • [Mono] Runtime test "test76531" fails in the LLVM (and mini) Full AOT configuration on linux-x64 #113060
  • System.NotSupportedException: No data is available for encoding 1252 in .NET Core #113059
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a NormalizeEntrySeparator(Char, Char) method for ZipFileExtension. #113058
  • JIT: Redundant bounds check depending on branch order #113054
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/TypeInitialization/CircularCctors/CircularCctorThreeThreads03/CircularCctorThreeThreads03.cmd #113053
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.cmd #113052
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/Cmn/Cmn.cmd #113051
  • Test failure: Interop/StructMarshalling/PInvoke/MarshalStructAsLayoutExp/MarshalStructAsLayoutExp.cmd #113050
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.XmlDsigExcC14NTransformTest.ExcC14NSpecExample5 #113049

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Consider adding a Clone() Method to the hash implementations #111908
    Future
  • TensorPrimitives asymmetry between MultiplyAdd and MultiplyAddEstimate with trivial inputs #112989
  • Question: do I need to dispose the X509Certificate2 elements in an X509Chain myself? #112987
    10.0.0
  • System.Linq.Expressions may prevent assembly unloading when using MethodInfo objects from non-collectible type with collectible generic arguments #112518
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/explicit/basic/refloc_i4_r/refloc_i4_r.cmd #112619
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.cmd #112546
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_71611/Runtime_71611/Runtime_71611.cmd #112332
    10.0.0
  • Remove `Verify` macros in `importer.cpp` #64399
    Future
  • Review the multi-op instruction usage for Arm64 #68028
    10.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.StackTrace build emits several "Could not resolve reference" messages #113083
  • make simple-server open url with chromedriver #113066
  • Linker error in InputNumber #111160
  • Why my ETW provider is not showing up in logman? #112768
    10.0.0
  • System.Globalization Area Performance Tests #21274
  • `wasm` not support the FrameworkReference of `Microsoft.AspNetCore.App` #110036
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: stop using ehTrueEnclosingTryIndexIL outside of importation #113102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't break up loop bodies during hot jump compaction #113101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Better ARM intrinsics implementation for dn_simdhash #113095
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix TensorPrimitives.MultiplyAddEstimate for integers #113094
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Mark certain intrinsics as non-escaping #113093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ARM NEON path in dn_simdhash due to performance issues #113092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Document exceptions in OrderedDictionary #113091
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add API compat instructions to libraries building README #113088
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [infra] Add runtime-llvm to build analysis #113086
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Apple mobile] Set `DataSetXmlSerializationSupport` to `true` in `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests` #113084
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Fix R2R files doublemap on UNIX #113082
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use invariant culture when formatting capture transfer in regex source generator #113081
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Remove unnecessary `GcInfoEncoder::DoNotTrackInPartiallyInterruptible` #113078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix icon and vn mismatch in an assertion #113072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify internal GC tracking structures #113071
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Assert pointer relocs are aligned #113069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Backport "Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try." #113055
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Template EH-specific checks in 3-opt layout #111437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm Clone methods #113087
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.MultiplyAddEstimate for integers #113047
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Add approved TensorPrimitives surface area #112933
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add test for external assembly probe mechanism #113007
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [android] Make Android app on coreclr use host-runtime contract and provide external assembly probe #112938
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Do not cache method parameters for collectible methods #113085
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • Tensor primitives divide int32 #111505
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution
  • JIT: Consolidate layout passes into one phase #112004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [8.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112790
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.15
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.4
  • [wasm] Stop hardcoding TFM in Wasm.Build.Tests #112955
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 133.0.6943.141, windows: 134.0.6998.35 #113036
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Separate code manager for the interpreter #112985
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix exception propagation from managed to native on Unix #112957
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112991
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0] Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112992
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cached interface dispatch for coreclr #111771
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Publish dotnet/runtime using standard Arcade Publish tooling #111934
    blocked, area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] Enable conditional chaining for Intel APX #111072
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Support Telemetry Schema Url in tracing and metrics #113034
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 10.0.0
  • Experimental PR #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Perform additional checks in `PEHeaders`. #113048
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Clean-up reflection stack and unify managed type name parsers. #112670
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono, community-contribution
  • Generate calls to interface methods through resolve helper #112406
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Clean up code gen for floating comparisons #111626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] PerfScore #113011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] build paltests #112404
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Further clean up usages of LowLevelList<T> #109114
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Stackwalking support TransitionFrames and FuncEvalFrames #112997
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][http] mute JS exceptions about network errors + HEAD verb #113014
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Harden some reflection invoke tests #113000
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • Improve zero-sized methods check and missing ret at exit #112082
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • JIT: Devirtualization and inlining for GVM #112353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Simplify stack probing on riscv64 #112697
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • arm64: Add return cases into optimise bools #112945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Doc fixes for .NET 10 Preview 1 update #113027
    needs-area-label
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use collection expressions in array.cs #113028
    needs-area-label
  • Document NDK upgrade process #112885
    documentation, needs-area-label
  • Use minipal_getcpufeatures to detect for AVX #113032
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change assembler to clang in android MonoAOT #111666
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, 8.0.15
  • Implement `ShuffleNative` methods and optimise `Shuffle` for non-constant `indices` #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

  • Use SSA-based ComputeRange in assertprop #112824

  • Arm64: Implement region write barriers #111636

    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `WriteImportMapToHtml` tests #112859

  • [browser] Generate boot config as javascript module #112947

  • [mono] Fix detecting [DisableRuntimeMarshalling] in MarshalingPInvokeScanner. #112981

  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Broken Build]: Attempting upgrade to .Net 10 Preview 1 results in missing virtual directory '_framework' content #47230
  • dotnet tool install is failing: One of the request inputs is out of range. #47223

Closed

  • option to ignore SSL error when install/update dotnet tool #44094
  • [NETSDKE2E]The workload version in ‘dotnet workload --version| --info“ should show the workload set version rather than the manifest version after set update mode to workload-set. #42527
  • ProjectReference doesn't behave the same as PackageReference for contentFiles #2882
    Discussion
  • Poorly formatted launchSettings.json and dotnet watch goes into production #45509

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure container generation uniformly reports outputs to MSBuild #47234
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Revert "Use pipeline artifacts for final artifacts" #47233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix signing opt in/out #47232
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add HttpResults to the ImplicitUsings of ASP.NET Core projects so TypedResults/Results<T1,T2> don't need an explicit using #47231
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Sync NativeAOTRuntimePack with ILCompilerSupported RIDs #47229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --interactive by default for sessions that are local. #47226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Attempt to Fix and Re-enable HasIncludedFiles Test #47220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Check shipping packages for poison #47224
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Update to clarify the first tuesday branding date #47201
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47195
  • Check shipping packages for poison #47176
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change MSTest Runner to Microsoft.Testing.Platform #47091
    Area-Common templates
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • light up container publish for all Exe/WinExe projects by default #47064
    untriaged, Document for new feature, Area-Containers
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #47221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump MSTest version to 3.8.2 in MSTest templates #47193
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.1xx
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Suppress welcome message with get* builds Fixes #38444 #47197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • Run `AddImplicitDefineConstants` after `PrepareForBuild`. #45877
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Draft of guidelines for managing various kinds of breaking changes in the SDK #45288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove underscore from `_UseManagedNtlm` #47141
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2654113 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
